Verify the first row of the user data table is visible, has height 50px, and an alternating background color of #F8F8F8
Verify the 'User ID' cell displays 'U101'
Verify the 'Name' cell displays 'Jane Doe'
Verify the 'Status' cell displays 'Active'
Verify all cells within the row have padding 12px
Verify there are exactly 5 columns in this row
Verify the 'Confirm Delete' modal dialog is initially hidden
Perform action to show the modal dialog
Verify it becomes visible with an overlay background color rgba(0,0,0,0.6)
Verify the modal itself has width 400px, height 250px, border radius 10px, and z-index 1000
Verify the 'Cancel' button has text 'Cancel' and color #6C757D
Verify the file upload progress bar is visible, displays width 75%, has background color #007BFF, height 8px, border radius 4px, and opacity 1
Verify the text '75% Complete' is visible directly above it
Verify the progress animation takes 800ms to complete a full cycle

Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link in the footer is visible, has text color #6C757D, font size 14px, font weight 400, text aligned left, href 'https://www.example.com/privacy', padding 5px, and margin 0px 10px
Focus the 'Privacy Policy' link
Verify it has a text decoration of 'underline'
Verify the language selector dropdown is visible, has initial value 'English', width 150px, height 38px, border 1px solid #CED4DA, aria-label 'Select Language', and contains exactly 3 options
Verify the currently selected option displays 'English'
Expand the language selector dropdown
Verify its height is 120px

Verify the 'Success!' notification banner is visible, has background color #D4EDDA, displays text 'Successfully saved changes.', has text color #155724, padding 15px 20px, border radius 5px, animates with a slide-in transition lasting 400ms from the top, and auto-hides after 3s
Verify the price range slider is visible, with initial values 10 and 100, width 250px, height 20px
Verify the track's background color is #E9ECEF
Verify each thumb has width 18px and height 18px
Drag the slider
Verify the value updates correctly when dragging
Verify the current price value is '50'
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox is visible, initially unchecked, has label text 'Remember me', visual width 18px, and height 18px
Check the 'Remember Me' checkbox
Verify its background color is #007BFF with a 1px solid #007BFF border
Verify the aria-checked attribute changes from 'false' to 'true'
Verify the product gallery carousel has width 800px, height 450px, and slide transition takes 500ms
Verify 'Previous' and 'Next' scroll buttons are visible
Verify it contains exactly 5 images
Verify the current image source is 'gallery_image_1.jpg'
Verify 5 pagination dots are visible
Verify the first item in the shopping cart list is visible
Verify it displays product name 'Blue T-shirt'
Verify its quantity value 2
Verify its price text '$24.99'
Verify the item's image source is 'tshirt_blue.jpg'
Verify the 'Remove' button is visible
Verify the subtotal for this item is displayed as '$49.98'
Verify the global search bar is visible, displays placeholder text 'Search products...', has width 280px, height 42px, border radius 20px, and placeholder text align 'left'
Verify a search icon is visible on the right with alt text 'Search icon'
Focus the global search bar
Verify its border changes to 1px solid #0056B3
Verify the user profile avatar is visible, has a circular shape, width 60px, height 60px, source 'user_avatar.png', alt text 'User profile picture', 2px solid #DDDDDD border, and opacity 1

Hover the info icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible, displays text 'More information about this field', has background color #333333, text color #FFFFFF, padding 8px 12px, border radius 4px, opacity 0.9, 200ms transition, and is positioned 10px below the icon
Verify the 'Invalid email' error message is initially hidden
Enter an invalid email
Verify it becomes visible, displays text 'Please enter a valid email address.', has text color #DC3545, font size 13px, margin-top 5px, text aligned left, and appearance animation is a 200ms fade-in
